text:
Hi fellow Hublers!
Is there anyway to acces the site tree from hubl. For example get all child pages of a given parent page?
Thanks :pray: :star:
That would be amazing and super helpful for obvious reasons, sadly it's not possible as far as i know, I usually create HubDB tables or Menus to handle those things
hey guys, I'm not sure where to put the meta viewport tag to make my templates responsive
You can put it in .html file but honestly you might want to look at doing it with DND tags instead: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes/responsive-breakpoints>
It's a much more flexible and reliable way to do it these days
<@U05DMFSHTCP> You can add it in base.html file
Thanks everyone! <@U01QVR44MEY> thank you for pointing me to a more elegant solution
